events.name: Hackathon 2012 - Iceland
events.about:
On behalf of the Startup Iceland Conference 2012 – we invite you to take part in a unique event happening for the first in Iceland.

In Hackathon 2012 - Iceland, we will have guests from different local startups giving short programming challenges while describing what experiences they encounter in their field. These are the same challenges that will be used by participants during the hacking session.

This event is open to students, hobbyists, professionals, anybody who likes to hack on cool code.

The event will be hosted by The School of Computer Science at Reykjavik University and will take place on May 29 from 9am-9pm.

- Agenda
09:00 registration
10:00 - 10:30 welcome
10:30 - 12:00 companies and their challenges 
12:00 - 20:00 participants time to hack problems
20:00 - 21:00 participants time to present their solutions and judging and awards

*Coffee and pizza are going to be available throughout the event - self service eating policy during the event :)

- Participant Companies
Clara, GreenQloud, IIIM, Microsoft, Videntifier

*Maximum 5 people can be in a team.

*Individual with no team will be teamed up randomly with other individuals - It is not necessary for people to be in a team if you like to be alone please let us know.

To sign up please send an email to Hamid@iiim.is with the following information:

Please have the Email subject to be Hackathon Signup

If you are signing up with a team 
Team Name:
Full Name(s):
Email Address(es):
Organization/University/Other:
Whether you want to be alone or in a team - if you are an individual 

Deadline for signing up is 24th of May.
